data.symptom: Config paths wrong - Linux paths appearing on Windows machine
data.actual_cause: DO server syncing Linux paths to shared repo, overwriting Windows-specific config.json
data.why_not_caught: No identity logging on startup to show which machine's config was loaded
data.prevention: Each platform keeps its own config.json. Never commit machine-specific paths to shared repos.
data.override_reason: Recreating historical incident that was accidentally deleted - data recovered from session logs
